sources.title: Reasonable Doubt | Full Movie | Action Crime | Samuel L. Jackson
sources.description:
After a fatal hit and run, up and coming assistant DA Mitch Brody (Cooper) must prosecute a suspect (Jackson) for the crime he committed. Mitch does his best to throw the case, and is successful due to some inconclusive evidence. However, following the trial, Mitch quickly realizes that he may have been wrong and finds himself struggling to hunt the man he got acquitted.
2014.  Stars: Dominic Cooper, Samuel L. Jackson, Gloria Reuben

metadata.Plot: Up-and-coming District Attorney, Mitch Brockton is involved in a fatal hit-and-run, but Clinton Davis, is found with the body and charged with murder. Believing that Davis is innocent, Brockton is compelled to throw the trial. Soon after, Brocton's perfect life begins to unravel as he realizes that the man he set free is hiding a secret that will destroy him.
metadata.Actors: Dominic Cooper, Samuel L. Jackson, Gloria Reuben
